title: Guilford Courthouse National Military Park: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer            Volunteer         UNCG students from the Filipino American Student Association (FASA) volunteering at the Hoskin's Farm NPS  Volunteering is an American tradition that lives on at Guilford Courthouse National Military Park. Our volunteers are actively involved in preserving and protecting natural, cultural and historical resources and assisting with educational programs at the park. Our success depends on people like you who treasure this special place! Do something revolutionary and join the team! Whether you prefer a one time or recurring opportunity, and if you are interested in joining a team of "Very Important People" (our volunteers) who help to enhance the park experience, then Guilford Courthouse National Military Park is the place for YOU! Please call the visitor center for more information about volunteer opportunities: (336) 288-1776.  Â     Current Volunteer Opportunities
